com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration
Class MapBasedConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.Configuration
      com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.BaseConfiguration
          com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.MapBasedConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsonConfiguration, YamlConfiguration
public abstract class MapBasedConfiguration
extends BaseConfiguration

Abstract class containing methods used by map based configurations such as YamlConfiguration and JsonConfiguration

Since:
3/9/12
Author:
Muhammad Ashraf

getList

public <E> List<E> getList(Class<E> type,
                           String key)
Retrieves the value of the given key and converts it into a list of of given type 
      Properties File
      files= /tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt
      List files = propertyConfiguration.getList(File.class, "files");

      Yaml
      files: [/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]
      List files = yamlConfiguration.getList(File.class, "files");

      Json
      "files": [/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]
      List files = jsonConfiguration.getList(File.class, "files");

      System variable
      List classpath  = systemPropertyConfiguration.getList(File.class, "java.class.path");

Specified by:
getList in class Configuration
Parameters:
type - type the raw value will be converted to
key - key to use to retrieve the value
Returns:
List of type E
Since:
0.1

getNestedList

public <E> List<E> getNestedList(Class<E> type,
                                 String key)
Converts all the values associated with this nested key, converts them to List of given type and returns the list 
      Properties File
      temporary.files= /tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt
      List files = propertyConfiguration.getNestedList(File.class, "temporary.files");

      Yaml
      temporary:
          files: [/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]
      List files = yamlConfiguration.getNestedList(File.class, "temporary.files");

      Json
      "temporary":{
          "files": [/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]
          }
      List files = jsonConfiguration.getNestedList(File.class, "temporary.files");

      System variable
      List classpath  = systemPropertyConfiguration.getNestedList(File.class, "java.class.path");

Specified by:
getNestedList in class Configuration
Parameters:
type - type the raw value will be converted to
key - nested key to use to retrieve the value
Returns:
List of type E
Since:
0.1

setList

public <E> void setList(String key,
                        List<E> input)
Converts all the values in the input List to String, associate it with the given key and sets it in the configuration. 
      Properties File
      List files = Arrays.asList(new File(/tmp/doc1.txt),new File(/tmp/doc2.txt));
      propertyConfiguration.setList("tempFiles",files);
      tempFiles= /tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt

      Yaml
      List files = Arrays.asList(new File(/tmp/doc1.txt),new File(/tmp/doc2.txt));
      yamlConfiguration.setList("tempFiles",files);
      tempFiles: [/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]

      Json
      List files = Arrays.asList(new File(/tmp/doc1.txt),new File(/tmp/doc2.txt));
      jsonConfiguration.setList("tempFiles",files);
      "tempFiles": [/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]

Specified by:
setList in class Configuration
Parameters:
key - the key for the value to set
input - List of value to set
Since:
0.1

setNested

public <E> void setNested(String key,
                          E input)
Converts the input to String, associate it with the given nested key and sets it in the configuration. 
      Properties File
      propertyConfiguration.setNested("production.url","www.acme.com/rest");
      production.url=www.acme.com/rest

      Yaml
      yamlConfiguration.setNested("production.url","www.acme.com/rest");
      production:
               url: www.acme.com/rest

      Json
      jsonConfiguration.setNested("production.url","www.acme.com/rest");
      "production":{
               "url": www.acme.com/rest
             }

Specified by:
setNested in class Configuration
Parameters:
key - the key for the value to set
input - value to set
Since:
0.1

setNestedList

public <E> void setNestedList(String key,
                              List<E> input)
Converts all the values in input List to String, associate it with the given nested key and sets it in the configuration. 
      Properties File
      List files = Arrays.asList(new File(/tmp/doc1.txt),new File(/tmp/doc2.txt));
      propertyConfiguration.setNestedList("production.files",files);
      production.files=/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt

      Yaml
      List files = Arrays.asList(new File(/tmp/doc1.txt),new File(/tmp/doc2.txt));
      yamlConfiguration.setNestedList("production.files",files);
      production:
          files:[/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]

      Json
      List files = Arrays.asList(new File(/tmp/doc1.txt),new File(/tmp/doc2.txt));
      jsonConfiguration.setNestedList("production.files",files);
      "production":{
          "files":[/tmp/doc1.txt,/tmp/doc2.txt]
          }

Specified by:
setNestedList in class Configuration
Parameters:
key - the key for the value to set
input - List of value to set
Since:
0.1
